sentence.text: In Mfrprd6 eyes, a significant 1.5- to 2.0-fold decrease was observed among transcripts of genes linked to retinal degeneration, including those involved in visual cycle (Rpe65, Lrat, Rgr), phototransduction (G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway, Guca1b, Rgs9), and photoreceptor disc morphogenesis (Rpgrip1 and Fscn2).
